attributes.additional_details: Despite RBS (Natwest) and Lloyds being saved by the British taxpayer – they continue to off-shore thousands of back-office and call centre jobs to India and elsewhere – putting the very taxpayers who saved them on the dole – our government seem not to care one jot about this important issue. Back this e-petition to keep British jobs in Britain – better still – force the repatriation of every job lost to "off-shoring" since the banks were bailed-out by the taxpayer.
